data.title: Movies and TV shows casting in Oregon
data.meta_description: Backstage compiled a list of projects casting right now in Oregon, neighboring states, and nationwide, and which roles they're looking to fill.
data.text:
The glitz and glam of Hollywood captures the attention of Americans starting from an early age. Beyond celebrities’ Instagram Stories and red carpet poses, there are actors out there paying their dues and honing their craft in pursuit of a sustainable career or a fulfilling sideline. Submitting to casting calls is a big part of that journey.

Whether you’re a working actor or an aspiring one, you might be curious to know which movies and TV shows are casting roles near you. Backstage compiled a list of projects casting right now in Oregon, neighboring states, and nationwide, and which roles they’re looking to fill.

Canva

‘Van Damned’

– Project type: feature film

– Roles:

— Brendan (supporting, male, 28-40)

— Willow (lead, female, 22-35)

— Knocko Nolan (lead, male, 50-65)

– Average hourly rate: $20

– Casting locations: Portland

– Learn more about the feature film here

Canva

‘Untitled10’

– Project type: feature film

– Roles:

— DJ’s Sons (day player, male, 16-20)

— Angela (supporting, 31-50)

— Havanna (supporting, female, 19-25)

– Average hourly rate: not available

– Casting locations: Portland

– Learn more about the feature film here

Canva

‘Horsegirls’

– Project type: feature film

– Roles:

— Run of Show Stand In (background extra, male, 18-35)

– Average hourly rate: $21

– Casting locations: Portland

– Learn more about the feature film here

Canva

‘Nurture’ Horror Short’

– Project type: short film

– Roles:

— Rose (lead, female, 25-39)

– Average hourly rate: $30

– Casting locations: Portland

– Learn more about the short film here

Canva

– Project type: documentary

– Learn more about the documentary here

Canva

Canva

Canva

Canva

Canva

– Learn more about the scripted show here
